DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this registry is to collect information on the health status of patients receiving Marquis/Maximo VR Implantable Cardiac Defibrillators (ICDs), how the devices are being programmed and how this correlates to clinical patient outcome.
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 years of age or older Patients implanted with a new or replacement Marquis VR or Maximo VR ICD Patients enrolled in a device study that affects treatment and/or programming
